item.title: How I use LLMs | Tools | Andrej Karpathy
item.description: The example-driven, practical walkthrough of Large Language Models and their growing list of related features - by How I use LLMs | Andrej Karpathy Chapters [00:00:00](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw) Intro into the growing LLM ecosystem [00:02:54](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=174s) ChatGPT interaction under the hood [00:13:12](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=792s) Basic LLM interactions examples [00:18:03](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=1083s) Be aware of the model you're using, pricing tiers [00:22:54](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=1374s) Thinking models and when to use them [00:31:00](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=1860s) Tool use: **internet search** [00:42:04](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWvNQjAaOHw&t=2524s) Tool use: **deep research** [00:50:57](https://www.
